Estate Lite Theme

  Estate Lite Theme is a Free Alternative Plone Theme Product for Plone 3 version. It is a lite version of Estate Modern Plone Theme.
  
  Theme was tested with Plone 3.3
  
  &copy; "Quintagroup":http://quintagroup.com, 2006-2009
  
Features

  * Second-column portlets are placed at the bottom of the content area
  
  * Default search is replaced with Search portlet
  
  * Semantic mark-up
 
Home Directory

  "skins.quintagroup.com":http://skins.quintagroup.com/estate-lite

Authors

  * Volodymyr Rudnytskyi
  
  * Borys Olekhnovych
